TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_kawlah, title = kawlah, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/kawlah} }

S.FORM: kawlah (kamu nu Hulam: 獎勵 ,獎狀,獎品) u tatipeluk atu tuud ku sapapabeli i kapahay a tademaw, nikaseneng niza.
kawlah (kamo no Holam: 獎勵 ,獎狀,獎品) o tatipelok ato tood ko sapapabeli i kapahay a tademaw, nikaseneng niza.
